#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include <sstream>
using namespace std;


/*
std::ostringstream sstream;
sstream << "select logged from login where id = " << ClientID;
std::string query = sstream.str();
*/
int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int i,t;
//    s="1";
    /*for(i=2;i<=1000000;i++)
    {
        ss<<i;
    }
    s+=ss.str();
    cout<<s<<endl;*/
    int n;
    size_t pos,l;
    string k;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ostringstream ss;
        string s;
        cin>>n;
        cin>>k;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            ss<<i;
        }
        s=ss.str();
     //   cout<<s<<endl;
        l=s.length();
        pos=s.find(k);
        long long count=0;
        while(pos!=string::npos)
        {
     //       cout<<pos<<endl;
            count++;
            pos=s.find(k,pos+1);
        }
        ss.flush();
        s.clear();
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
